description.value:
The beauty of magic and all its boundless possibilities influences your work. Whether its drawing arcane sigils or recounting the elegance of magic, the endless expanse is represented in your work to draw your onlookers in. When you envision your spells, the brilliant sparks and engraved constellations form shapes that always impress.

Favored Tradition Arcane

Additional Spells 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0uRpypf1Hi7ahvTl]{Shattering Gem}, 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.K2WpC3FFoHrqX9Q5]{Hypnotize}, 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ma3sndEAZdz0Cy2H]{Mercurial Stride}, 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gasOL6a0WhOhUsgL]{Etheric Shards}, 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jj5d830iUi2ZlQfs]{Blessed Boundary} 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9igi8LcrNQKwljK7]{Spell Riposte} 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rwCh2qTYPA44KEoK]{Dream Council} 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.coKiMMBLESkaLNVa]{Proliferating Eyes} 10th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.AuIiqc7jjiy1GZ75]{Manifestation}

Visionary Spell You learn the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.GMd0P8ZU34TbHHWM]{Tessellation} foundation visionary spell.
